description:
Column with sodium (Na+) counter ions

• Only water is required for the analysis of neutral sugars

• Can be used in combination (2-3 column in row with same or different exclusion limit)

• Fulfill USP L22 and L58 requirements

 

SUGAR KS-801 and SUGAR KS-802

Separates saccharides by combination of ligand exchange (Na+) and size exclusion modes

Only water is required for the analysis of neutral sugars

Exclusion limit 1,000 and 10,000

​

SUGAR KS-803 and SUGAR KS-804

Suitable for separation of polysaccharides by size exclusion mode

Can be used in combination with other columns e.g., SUGAR KS-802 and SUGAR KS-801

Exclusion limit 50,000 and 400,000 MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Liquid Chromatograph (HPLC) in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional Liquid Chromatograph (HPLC) with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
